name: End Scene
description: Image, text overlay that links user to a category using the markup editor

attribute_definition_groups.name: Button Specification
attribute_definition_groups.description: Specify the link for the 'Show Now' button.

attribute_definitions.name: Link
attribute_definitions.description: Specification for the link to where the user will be directed.

attribute_definitions.name: Button Name
attribute_definitions.description: The text to be displayed on Botton. If nothing is entered 'Shop Now' will be displayed.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Background
attribute_definition_groups.description: The visual display of the banner image in the background.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Text Overlay
attribute_definition_groups.description: The overlay text on top of the banner image.
